_sText: **Fully Working Escalators** created by UNREAL I'm kinda bored and lacking inspiration to map lately, so I made these as a self-challenge and to pass my free-time. Anyway, I hope you enjoy these. The pack includes two diferent styles, flat ones and ones with steps. Of course the steps are more complex but I decided to include both in the same. I think they are kinda needed, as I don't see many on any maps, maybe because of its complexity? I don't know. Both styles include bottom to top and top to bottom so you don't have to change anything besides the trigger push direction. **IMPORTANT ADVICE:** - If you plan on using many of the same ones, you should first "Special-paste" on Hammer and add a prefix to the copied one, so entities don't mess up with each other. - Also, remember to keep the "tool/invisible" covering the steps or else SOMETHING TERRIBLE WILL HAPPEN. - I edited a default texture to make it scroll, If you want to change the texture its up to you to edit the VMF, currently the material file looks like this: "TextureScroll" { "Texturescrollvar" "$Basetexturetransform" "Texturescrollrate" "1" // Sets the speed "Texturescrollangle" "90" // Sets the angle } - If you rotate them, don't forget to set the push direction. If you use them a simple thank will do.
